The main warehouse dedicated to retaining walls, such as EcoRing and MiniEcoRing, covers approximately 2,500 m² indoors, with a total storage capacity of 3,200 tons of vibro-compressed concrete material. The loading area is equipped with two 10-ton overhead cranes, allowing the handling of pallets with 20 EcoRing pieces or 60 MiniEcoRing pieces. The inventory management system uses RFID tracking to monitor incoming and outgoing batches.

The EcoRing product, with a unit weight of 58 kg per block, is stored on pallets of 20 pieces, for a total weight of approximately 1,160 kg per pallet. In an area of 100 m², up to 90 pallets can be stored, totaling over 100 tons of material. The average storage time is 14 days, with an estimated storage cost of €0.80 per day per pallet, including handling and surveillance costs.

The MiniEcoRing, thanks to its reduced weight of 21 kg per block and packaging of 60 pieces per pallet (around 1,260 kg total), is stored in double-height aisles, optimizing space by 25% compared to standard EcoRing blocks. The average storage time is 10 days, with a cost of €0.55 per day per pallet. Loads are prepared with shrink film and automatically identified via QR code.

Products from the Curbing, Copings & Drain Channels line, such as SideLine SP8, SP10, SP12, and SP15, are kept in a separate 1,200 m² section of the warehouse, equipped with 3-level metal shelving. The average pallet weight varies between 700 and 1,400 kg depending on the version, and each type is placed in zones marked by thickness and color. The average storage time is 20-25 days, with a storage cost of €1.10 per day per pallet.

The GrecCurb100, weighing 69 kg per element and 24 pieces per pallet (about 1,656 kg total), is handled using electric forklifts with reinforced forks. Since it is intended for road supply, storage times are longer, averaging 30 days. The daily storage cost is €1.25, which also includes insurance coverage for handling-related damage.

The DrainConcaveDual is a lighter element (40 kg per piece), with a faster warehouse turnover: on average only 7 days of storage. Pallets containing 2 pieces per linear meter are stacked safely up to 5 levels, achieving a storage density of 10 tons per 50 m². Storage costs are low, around €0.45 per day per pallet.

Outdoor paving products such as WavePave, Rustika, and SculptStone are stored in a 3,000 m² warehouse to preserve surface finishing. Pallets, each weighing an average of 1,200 kg, are placed on single-level racks. The average storage cycle is 18 days, with a cost of €0.90 per day per pallet.

The warehouse is organized into sectors: Sector A is dedicated to retaining walls, Sector B to curbs and copings, and Sector C to paving products. Each sector includes a picking area with automated order preparation. Trucks are loaded with an average of 22 pallets per trip. The average preparation time for a mixed order (e.g., EcoRing + SideLine) is 90 minutes.
